price: Hakika wewe huna mamlaka juu ya waja wangu. Na Mola wako Mlezi anatosha kuwa ni wa kutegemewa.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا
footnotes: Ama waja wangu walio nisafia niya Mimi wewe huna uwezo wa kuwapotoa, kwa kuwa wao wanamtegemea Mola wao Mlezi. Na Yeye anatosha kabisa kuwa ni wa kuwanusuru wakimtaka msaada wa kusalimika nawe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
